example.eg: The singer recognized that his rival was indeed talented.
example.egtrans: 这名歌手承认他的对手确实很有才华。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 承认, 认识到, 意识到

dsense.name: recognize that, also UK: recognise that

example.eg: I recognize that I could be wrong.
The boss recognized his team's performance.
example.egtrans: 老板对他团队的表现进行了表彰。

example.eg: Most countries recognize the Geneva Conventions.
example.egtrans: 绝大多数国家都认可日内瓦国际公约。

example.eg: The government officially recognized the new country.
example.egtrans: 该政府官方承认了这个新的国家。
该主席准许这位代表发言。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 允许…说话, 准许…发言

dsense.name: officially recognize [sth/sb], also UK: officially recognise [sth/sb]

example.eg: Many Western countries have officially recognised Kosovo.
example.egtrans: 许多西方国家都已正式承认了科索沃。

dsense.name: officially recognize [sth/sb] as [sth], also UK: officially recognise [sth/sb] as [sth]

example.eg: British Sign Language was officially recognised as a language of the UK in 2003.
